participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and thoughtful, often balancing work and personal interests. Friendly and open to new connections.
participant_1.background: I collect high-quality 3D models that I can use for my work. I procrastinate on my lesson plans. I started to go jogging every morning to try to lose weight. I enjoy mystery flavour cake. I've kept my love of horror movies from my parents.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and adventurous, passionate about storytelling and science fiction. Always seeking to share experiences with friends.
participant_2.background: I have a student id and hate paying my bills. I love sharing my love of comic books and animals with others. I've been single for a while because I'm always on the go with my work and my dreams of going to Mars. I love making short films with my camcorder. I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm not really interested in knowing my future.

content.text: Hey! What are you up to?
I'm working on a short film, I'm trying to make a movie that's both entertaining and educational.
That's awesome! What's it about?
It's about a group of kids who go on an adventure to Mars.
That sounds really cool! Do you have a cast yet?
Yeah, I have a few friends who are in it.
That's great! I hope it goes well.
Thanks! Me too!
What else do you like to do?
I love comic books, animals, and horror movies.
I love comic books too! What are your favorite ones?
I love The Walking Dead, and I'm really excited for the new season.
Me too! I'm a big fan of the comics.
I'm also a big fan of animals. I have a cat and a dog.
I love animals too! I have a dog and a rabbit.
That's awesome! What are their names?
My dog's name is Max, and my rabbit's name is Snowball.
I love those names! They're so cute!
Thanks! I love them too.
I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too!
Do you want to grab a coffee sometime?
I would love to!
Great! I'll text you my number.
Sounds good
